properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 4 at 9:14AM CST until February 8 at 2:24AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Buttahatchie River and Tombigbee River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Tombigbee River at Bigbee
* from Thursday, February 6 until Friday, February 7.
* At 8 AM Tuesday the stage was...6.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 16.7 feet on Thursday, February 6.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage and crest near 16.7 feet on
Thursday, February 6. The river will fall below flood stage by
Friday, February 7.
* At 17.0 feet...Water is flowing over portions of Hood Road and
extensive agricultural flooding is occurring.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
